Html:
I was wondering when the polygon feature would be available in the WPF version. I am looking at your latest WPF version and do not see it. If it is there, how do you call it?

Thanks much!
its integrated in marker, just like the route, add points to list called Polygon in GMapMarker, call RegeneratePolygonShape to generate shape before adding it to map

Do you have any examples of setting up a polygon marker?

 

Thanks!
